column4: bosoom no ne dadu mu no
column10: ndɛ da yi ara a: dakor yi ara na Babilɔnhen twee piin Jerusalɛm."

column4: Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Hom mfa dadzesɛn no nsi do
column5: na hom nhue nsu so ngu mu:"
na abasa no; fa mbiew pa hyɛ no ma."

column3: na hom nhyɛ mbiew no so wɔ ase: ma onhur yie; nyew
column4: ma ne mbiew no mben wɔ no mu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Ndom nka bɔgya kurow
column3: ɔnka dadzesɛn a ne nkandar wɔ no mu
column4: na ne nkandar mmfi no mu! Hom nyiyi no wɔ mu nankum nankum; tonto biara mmbɔ no."

column2: "Na no bɔgyaa wɔ no mu; ɔkae guu ɔbotan pataa do; oennhue enngu famu
"Mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ ma ɔakɔtwe ebufuhyew aba ebedzi wer ntsi
column3: mehue bɔgya a ɔkae no egu botan pataa do

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Ndom nka bɔgya kurow no! Mo so mebɛma n'ase abo adɔɔ so."
"Na fa no pan si ne ngyansenama no do
column5: na no ho fi no nnan
column6: ma no ho nkandar no nhyew."

column2: "Ɔayɛ edwuma aberɛ: naaso ne nkandar dodow no mmfi no ho: gya mma ne nkandar no mmfi ho."

column3: mutwuuw wo ho wɔ w'atantandze no mu no: wo ho emmfir wɔ w'atantandze no mu; ntsi
column4: wo ho renntsew wɔ w'efifidze no mu ara bio
column5: ekodu dɛ m'ebufuhyew a ɔwɔ wo do no bɛmee."
eso murunnu moho; mbrɛ w'akwan tse
column6: na mbrɛ wo nyɛe tse no

column7: medze ɔbɔ miriyi w'enyiwa n'akɔndɔdze efi wo ho: naaso mma nndzi nkɔmbɔ anaa nnsu

column2: "Si nkrum foo; mma nndzi owufo ho nkɔmbɔ
column4: na fa wo nsokota hyɛ w'anan

column2: "Dɛm na mekasaa kyerɛɛ ɔman no anapa; na ewimbir no na me yer wui: na anapa no meyɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ wɔhyɛɛ me no ara."

column3: Aso ennkɛkyerɛ hɛn hɛn ho ndzɛmba kor a dza ereyɛ no dɛm yi fa ho?"

column7: Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Hwɛ
column11: na dza hom kra hu no mbɔbɔr no; na hom mbabanyin na hom mbabaa a hom adan hɔn egya ekyir no bɔtotɔr afona ano."

column2: "Na hom bɛyɛ dɛ mbrɛ mayɛ yi: hom rennkata hom ano

column3: na hom nsokota ahyehyɛ hom anan: hom rinndzi nkɔmbɔ anaa hom runnsu: na hom bɛyeyɛ nkamfenkamfe wɔ hom emumuyɛ mu
column4: na hom esisi nkrum akyerɛkyerɛ hom ho."

column2: "Dɛm na Ezekiel bɛyɛ asɛnkyerɛdze ama hom; dɛ dza ɔayɛ nyinara hom bɛyɛ: ber a iyi bɛba mu no
column3: nna hom bohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE Nyankopɔn."

column4: ana ɔnnkɛba mu da no ara a mebɛgye hɔn nsamu ahoɔdzen
column7: na dza wɔdze hɔn akoma si do no
column8: hɔn mbabanyin na hɔn mbabaa no
column10: "dɛ da no ara mu na nyia ofi nsa no ɔbɛba wo nkyɛn abɛma w'asowa atse?"

column2: "Da no mu na w'ano bobue ama nyia oefi nsa no
column4: na anntɔ mmum bio: dɛm na ebɛyɛ asɛnkyerɛdze ama hɔn; na wobohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE."
